Tyler Lee

Programmer // Designer // Engineer

Born at a very young age, I've been attached to computer since my two year old revision first laid fingers on windows 95. However, for those that like to classify people, consider me an everythinger. Skydiving, hiking, traveling, welding; you name it I've probably done it.

Thanks for checking out my sight, there is still a long ways to go but feel free to observe my progress.
